mapper.insert: insert into cd_key (biz_type, expire_time, quantity, extend_obj, status) values (#{bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extendObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update cd_key set biz_type = #{bizType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_uri = #{sourceUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, random_num = #{randomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extend_obj = #{extendObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, biz_type, expire_time, quantity, source_uri, random_num, extend_obj, status, gmt_create, gmt_update from cd_key where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, biz_type, expire_time, quantity, source_uri, random_num, extend_obj, status, gmt_create, gmt_update from cd_key
